thread.title: Jose Altuve Is a Big Hit on the Road

author: Michael Salfino
title: Jose Altuve Is a Big Hit on the Road
text:
Astros star Jose Altuve is the reigning American League MVP and a fan favorite every time he steps in the batter’s box at Houston’s Minute Maid Park.
But it’s front of opposing fans where he’s compiled hits at a rate not seen in baseball for over 80 years.
On the road, Altuve is hitting .383 over his last 159 games, spanning 629 at bats.... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
